video.title: STUDY FINDS MANY CHILDREN ARE NOT GETTING THE PHYSICAL ACTIVITY THEY NEED
video.description: There is new information about your children and the exercise they need but may not be getting.  According to the U.S. Department of Agriculture children should have a minimum of sixty minutes of moderate to vigorous physical activity a day.  But a recent study finds as children grow older they are becoming less active and many do not meet the recommended guidelines.
